about_the_game:
Have you always thought you are meant for greatness? Have you ever wanted to test your skills as a dark cult leader? Or maybe you just like Dark Fantasy with a bit of silly humor? Just now you can test your skills! Became cult leader and lead it to achieve fame and glory. From day to day you wil get more followers and the treasury will be filled with blood and souls. But be careful. World is full of danger. Who you trust depends only on you.

Cult of Abaruth is economic strategy in a turn-based system which is easy to control and play - but full of challenges. This simulator of cult management will allow you to experience the climatic soundtrack and stylish pixel art graphics. Remember to plan your moves - this game is cruel to those who are too reckless.

"It's your story"
Give a name to your character, choose its look and specialization of cult. Every specialization can change your gameplay and make it easier or harder.

"Manage your Cult"
Select an action using the appropriate menu, you don't have to move from your headquarters! Watch new cultists join your ranks, how your army recruit and how priest perform dark rituals! Buy new skills in "the tree" and enjoy the great power that comes with them!

"Create Your Own Headquarters"
Don't you think that one building is not enough for such a huge organization? Thanks to the build system, you can change that. Why not, for example, build tents for training the army? Or build a market? Some buildings can also be upgraded to work even better for the sake of your cult!


"Explore the mysterious world of Primeval"
Immerse yourself in the mysterious world of Primeval with the power of one of the Old Ones! Discover the history of the world and the creatures that live in it. Thanks to the event system you can decide about the fate of your organization as well as the entire region (and even the world)! Remember that it is only up to how you wicked you will be and who you will leave alive.

Feature list:
*Many unique events!
*Atmospheric graphics
*Music to highlight events
*Clear game mechanics
